00011 // point.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "light.h"
00014 #include "shape.h"
00015 // PointLight Classes
00016 class PointLight : public Light {
00017 public:
00018         // PointLight Public Methods
00019         PointLight(const Transform &light2world, const Spectrum &intensity);
00020         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi, VisibilityTester *vis) const;
00021         Spectrum Power(const Scene *) const {
00022                 return Intensity * 4.f * M_PI;
00023         }
00024         bool IsDeltaLight() const { return true; }
00025         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &P, float u1, float u2,
00026                         Vector *wo, float *pdf, VisibilityTester *visibility) const;
00027         Spectrum Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1, float u2,
00028                         float u3, float u4, Ray *ray, float *pdf) const;
00029         float Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00030 private:
00031         // PointLight Private Data
00032         Point lightPos;
00033         Spectrum Intensity;
00034 };
00035 // PointLight Method Definitions
00036 PointLight::PointLight(const Transform &light2world,
00037                 const Spectrum &intensity)
00038         : Light(light2world) {
00039         lightPos = LightToWorld(Point(0,0,0));
00040         Intensity = intensity;
00041 }
00042 Spectrum PointLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi,
00043                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00044         *wi = Normalize(lightPos - p);
00045         visibility->SetSegment(p, lightPos);
00046         return Intensity / DistanceSquared(lightPos, p);
00047 }
00048 Spectrum PointLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, float u1,
00049                 float u2, Vector *wi, float *pdf,
00050                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00051         *pdf = 1.f;
00052         return Sample_L(p, wi, visibility);
00053 }
00054 float PointLight::Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const {
00055         return 0.;
00056 }
00057 Spectrum PointLight::Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1,
00058                 float u2, float u3, float u4,
00059                 Ray *ray, float *pdf) const {
00060         ray->o = lightPos;
00061         ray->d = UniformSampleSphere(u1, u2);
00062         *pdf = UniformSpherePdf();
00063         return Intensity;
00064 }
00065 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Light *CreateLight(const Transform &light2world,
00066                 const ParamSet &paramSet) {
00067         Spectrum I = paramSet.FindOneSpectrum("I", Spectrum(1.0));
00068         Point P = paramSet.FindOnePoint("from", Point(0,0,0));
00069         Transform l2w = Translate(Vector(P.x, P.y, P.z)) * light2world;
00070         return new PointLight(l2w, I);
00071 }
